comments.body: Here's the other part of the circular reference which I had to move to the class __init__ to resolve

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@                                  ". Current version " + xlrd.__VERSION__)

        from pandas.io.excel._base import ExcelFile
        # If filepath_or_buffer is a url, want to keep the data as bytes so
        # can't pass to get_filepath_or_buffer()
